name: The Box (itch) (Aaron Wise)
description:
This game was created in 5 days:

A strange box is delivered to your house in the middle of the night, you take it inside not knowing what it could be and open the box to discover... Something. 

Interact with the box in your house & find out what is happening. Don't take your eyes off of the box otherwise something may happen. What lives inside the box? What mysteries will you uncover?

Please enjoy this narrative experience for what it is.
Follow me on Patreon for new games each month exclusive to Patreon:

https://www.patreon.com/trialbyfir3

WASD - MOVE

F - FLASHLIGHT

MOUSE - LOOK
